ABOUT.CONNECT_WITH_PEOPLE: Connect with People all over the world!
ABOUT.FUBBLE_DESCRIPTION: Fubble is an app for video calls. Stay in touch with your family and friends. Use Fubble to work from home and conference with your collegues. The app is currently an alpha stage - you can use it for free. We would love to hear your feedback!

INTRO.HEADER: Best way to connect with your friends, family or coworkers.
INTRO.FREE: Alpha available for windows and linux at the moment:

FEATURES.FEATURE6_DESCRIPTION: Light or dark - choose your side

CONTACT.NAME: Name
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: If you have any questions, suggestions, or if you would like further information, please don't hesitate to contact us:

DOWNLOAD.ENJOY: Download and test Fubble for free

NEWS.ALPHA_TEXT: We proudly announce the new fubble alpha for Windows and Linux! Over the last months we worked hard to create a stable product. Please bear in mind, that this is an early release version - so there might be bugs. We would really love your feedback, input, suggestions.
